scripts.all-tests: npm run verify-line-ending && npm run generate-fixtures && npm run unit-tests && npm run api-tests && npm run grammar-tests && npm run regression-tests && npm run hostile-env-tests
scripts.appveyor: npm run compile && npm run all-tests && npm run browser-tests
scripts.benchmark: npm run benchmark-parser && npm run benchmark-tokenizer
scripts.browser-tests: npm run compile && npm run generate-fixtures && cd test && karma start --single-run
scripts.circleci: npm test && npm run codecov && npm run downstream
scripts.droneio: npm run compile && npm run all-tests && npm run saucelabs
scripts.dynamic-analysis: npm run analyze-coverage && npm run check-coverage
scripts.profile: node --prof test/profile.js && mv isolate*.log v8.log && node-tick-processor
scripts.saucelabs: npm run saucelabs-evergreen && npm run saucelabs-ie && npm run saucelabs-safari
scripts.static-analysis: npm run check-version && npm run tslint && npm run code-style && npm run complexity
scripts.test: npm run compile && npm run all-tests && npm run static-analysis && npm run dynamic-analysis
